about_the_game:
DEEP IN THE UNIVERSE

After the final battle, humanity is gone, and you may be the last living being in this part of the Universe. Space stations and spaceships are still there in the darkness, unmanned, maintained by pre-programmed robots. And they have data: the most treasured commodity of all.

The game

You cannot enter ships and you cannot control your robots directly. The only way to finish the task lies in the art of programming.

Let them enter the ship…
…collect the data…
…and destroy everything that stands in the way

PROGRAMMING

Task of each mission is to bring requested amount of data back to the base and upload it to the databank. For that you need to upgrade up to four robots to enter, fight, retrieve, and cooperate.

name: Automatica Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) or Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual-Core 64-bit CPU
  • Graphics: DirectX10 Compatible GPU with 1 GB Video RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Tactical puzzle game where you need to make your moves ahead.
